StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCanvassDataByCardId2]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CardId uniqueiden..er AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @SchoolCode uniqueiden..er DECLARE @SchoolYear int
CREATE TABLE #RESULTS ( Date DATETIME ,ProspectId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER )
SELECT @SchoolCode = hs.rowguid, @SchoolYear = SCHOOL_YEAR FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE hsp INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL hs ON hs.SCHOOL_CODE = hsp.SCHOOL_CODE WHERE hsp.rowguid = @CardId
INSERT INTO #RESULTS SELECT EventDate AS date, prospec.d FROM ( select CAST( CONVERT(varchar(4), YEAR(t1.startdate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), MONTH(t1.startdate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), DAY(t1.startdate)) AS date.me) AS EventDate, t2.prospec.d from ( SELECT DISTINCT CAST(CONVERT(varchar(4), YEAR(e.startdate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), MONTH(e.startdate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), DAY(e.startdate)) AS date.me) AS Startdate FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject es ON es.subjec.d = @CardId AND e.id=es.even.d AND e.EventSourceId = 20
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT CAST(CONVERT(varchar(4), YEAR(updatedate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), MONTH(updatedate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), DAY(updatedate)) AS date.me) AS Startdate FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportEvent AS ie INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportPerson AS iper ON (iper.ImportEventId = ie.ImportEventId) INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Person AS per ON per.PersonId = iper.PersonId INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect AS p ON p.PersonId = iper.PersonId INNER join PROSPECTING.USMC.ProspectStatusHistory psh ON p.prospec.d=psh.prospec.d AND psh.Disposi.onId IN (2, 3, 4) WHERE ie.SchoolId = @SchoolCode and ie.Gradua.onYear = @SchoolYear AND ie.ImportEventStatusTypeId = 3 ) t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( select psh.prospec.d, min(psh.updatedate) as updatedate FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportEvent AS ie INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportPerson AS iper ON (iper.ImportEventId = ie.ImportEventId) INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Person AS per ON per.PersonId = iper.PersonId INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect AS p ON p.PersonId = iper.PersonId inner join PROSPECTING.USMC.ProspectStatusHistory psh on p.prospec.d=psh.prospec.d and psh.Disposi.onId IN (2,3, 4) WHERE ie.SchoolId = @SchoolCode and ie.Gradua.onYear = @SchoolYear AND ie.ImportEventStatusTypeId = 3 group by psh.prospec.d ) t2 ON (CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), t1.startdate, 120)) >= ( CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), t2.updatedate, 120))
) t3 WHERE ProspectId IS NOT NULL GROUP BY EventDate, ProspectId
INSERT INTO #RESULTS SELECT EventDate AS date, prospec.d FROM ( select CAST( CONVERT(varchar(4), YEAR(t1.startdate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), MONTH(t1.startdate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), DAY(t1.startdate)) AS date.me) AS EventDate, t2.prospec.d from ( SELECT DISTINCT CAST(CONVERT(varchar(4), YEAR(e.startdate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), MONTH(e.startdate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), DAY(e.startdate)) AS date.me) AS Startdate FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject es ON es.subjec.d = @CardId AND e.id=es.even.d AND e.EventSourceId = 20
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT CAST(CONVERT(varchar(4), YEAR(updatedate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), MONTH(updatedate)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), DAY(updatedate)) AS date.me) AS Startdate FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportEvent AS ie INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportPerson AS iper ON (iper.ChildImportEventId = ie.ImportEventId) INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Person AS per ON per.PersonId = iper.PersonId INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect AS p ON p.PersonId = iper.PersonId INNER join PROSPECTING.USMC.ProspectStatusHistory psh ON p.prospec.d=psh.prospec.d AND psh.Disposi.onId IN (2, 3, 4) WHERE ie.SchoolId = @SchoolCode and ie.Gradua.onYear = @SchoolYear AND ie.ImportEventStatusTypeId = 3 ) t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( select psh.prospec.d, min(psh.updatedate) as updatedate FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportEvent AS ie INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.ImportPerson AS iper ON (iper.ChildImportEventId = ie.ImportEventId) INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Person AS per ON per.PersonId = iper.PersonId INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect AS p ON p.PersonId = iper.PersonId inner join PROSPECTING.USMC.ProspectStatusHistory psh on p.prospec.d=psh.prospec.d and psh.Disposi.onId IN (2,3, 4) WHERE ie.SchoolId = @SchoolCode and ie.Gradua.onYear = @SchoolYear AND ie.ImportEventStatusTypeId = 3 group by psh.prospec.d ) t2 ON (CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), t1.startdate, 120)) >= ( CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), t2.updatedate, 120))
) t3 WHERE ProspectId IS NOT NULL GROUP BY EventDate, ProspectId
-- SELECT * FROM #RESULTS -- ORDER BY Date ASC, ProspectId
SELECT r.date ,COUNT(DISTINCT r.ProspectId) AS cumscrubbed FROM #RESULTS r -- WHERE r.date IN (SELECT MIN(r2.date) -- FROM #RESULTS r2 -- WHERE r2.ProspectId = r.ProspectId) GROUP BY r.date
DROP TABLE #RESULTS
END
